BackstoryDef.title: royal masseuse
BackstoryDef.description: When the tribe would go travel or hunt, [PAWN_nameDef] would always follow them to come back to the village the hands full of lost relics of the industrialized civilization, carrying rusted pistols and broken electronics. While [PAWN_possessive] people ignored or despised these artifacts, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to study them. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to create prototypes of rifles or other gadgets.\n\nDue to [PAWN_possessive] wierd interests, [Pawn_pronoun] never got along with the other kids.
